translation.text: Blue Mountains Line, Western Line - Major delays

Major delays are being experienced due to signal equipment repairs at Granville following lightning strikes and other severe weather incidents earlier. Replacement buses are being sourced with a small number in operation so far on impacted lines. Local bus routes may also be alternative where available. Sydney Trains apologises for these unavoidable delays
Cumberland Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Major delays

Major delays are being experienced due to signal equipment repairs at Granville following lightning strikes and other severe weather incidents earlier. Replacement buses are being sourced with a small number in operation so far on impacted lines. Local bus routes may also be alternative where available. Sydney Trains apologises for these unavoidable delays
North Shore Line, Northern Line - Delays

Customers we have major delays due to signal equipment repairs at Granville following lightning strikes and other severe weather incidents earlier. Please allow additional travel time or utilise local bus routes as an alternative.

due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions at Granville this train is diverted via Regents Park stopping Cabramatta & then all stations to Lidcombe & then as timetabled. You may need to change trains at Lidcombe or Cabramatta to complete your journey.due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions at Granville

due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions at Granville.
The lift between the concourse and Platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9379 3311.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3 and 4 is temporarily out of service.  If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9752 8529.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service. For any assistance, please see station staff or call 9848 9212.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7992.
The lift between the concourse and the Princes Highway is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9563 7574.

There are changes happening at Central Station during Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may be limited, which means using different stairs, escalators and lifts. 

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. 

For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

Access to the station from Como Parade will be temporarily unavailable from Monday 30 November whilst station updgrade work is being completed. During this time, please enter and exit the station via Railway Road entrance.
Due to external power supply issues there is currently no station lighting at this location. Please take care when boarding and alighting the train.
Due to external power supply issues there is currently no station lighting at this location. Please take care when entering and exiting the train.

There are changes at Sydenham station during Sydney Metro construction.

T3 Bankstown Line services to the City are available from platform 3 and to Lidcombe and Liverpool from platform 4.

A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5.

If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Monday 30 November to Thursday 03 December - nightly from 8pm until 4:30am.

The George St entrance/exit to Wynyard Station, Transit Hall and Hunter Tunnel will be closed during station upgrade works. Access to/from the station is still available via Carrington St, York St & Barangaroo. 

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff or call 9224 2959.
